name: Reverso (Jarrett Ang)
description:
Description:

Play as a circle who wants to escape a maze with its gravity changing powers, but don't touch the walls! Use power-ups scattered around the level to aid your escape, be careful though, some might mess you up.

Controls:

Hold space to reverse the player's gravity!

Credits:

All art assets made with Adobe Illustrator. Sounds & Music are royalty-free.

  • Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
  • Music obtained from https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/quantum-travel/
  • Co-developer https://soulbounded.itch.io/
